metric.description: Average latency for indexing documents, which is time it takes to index documents divided by number that were indexed. This only considers primary shards.
metric.label: Indexing Latency

metric.description: Number of documents being indexed for primary and replica shards.
metric.label: Total Shards
metric.title: Indexing Rate

metric.description: Number of documents being indexed for primary shards.
metric.label: Primary Shards
metric.title: Indexing Rate

metric.description: Average latency for searching, which is time it takes to execute searches divided by number of searches submitted. This considers primary and replica shards.
metric.label: Search Latency

metric.description: Number of search requests being executed across primary and replica shards. A single search can run against multiple shards!
metric.label: Total Shards
metric.title: Search Rate
